creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: two wide blue cotton paneled huipil; woven on a back strap loom; brocaded with large multicolored zoomorphic designs (butterfly, lion, turkey); brocade is woven on the two-faced brocade technique; panels are finished in four selvedge ends; square neckline is cutout and finished with a hand embroidered seam
medium: Cotton, mercerized cotton; supplementary weft patterning
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
